description: Episode number 3 of Series "Jesus of Nazareth". The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: the return from Egypt of Mary, Joseph and the Child; Jesus' bar mitzvah in the synagogue; Jesus is lost and found among the doctor's in the temple; John preaches at Jordan; the Zealots discuss John's mission; Jesus is baptized by John; Andrew and Philip follow Jesus.
